## Use nppr

1. Download ocean productivity data

```{r results=FALSE eval=FALSE}
library(nppr)
library(RCurl)
library(XML)
library(R.utils)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

# Create an empty folder to save your ocean produtivity files.

yourfolder <- paste0(getwd(), '/', 'vgpm') 

get_npp_vgpm(file.path = yourfolder,
             grid.size = 'low',
             time.span = 'monthly',
             satellite = 'MODIS',
             mindate = '2016-01-15', 
             maxdate = '2016-03-15') 

```

2. Read hdf file

```{r results=FALSE eval=FALSE}

yourfile <- paste0(yourfolder, '/vgpm')

read_hdf(file.path = yourfile)    

```
